safetyTips: High standard to cleaning procedures adhered to. 5* Food Hygiene Rating. Non contact doorstep delivery.
name: NO.54 VINTAGE TEAS
description: Homemade Afternoon Teas for delivery or collection. A delicious selection of finger sandwiches, sausage rolls, scotch eggs, mini quiches, scones with cream and jam and cakes! Any number of guests catered for, even one if you fancy a treating yourself! Dietary requirements catered for. Vintage china hire is also available if you would like to serve your Afternoon Tea on beautiful vintage china.  Order by email or phone.
